QueryResult.text: SELECT t.table_name object_name, 'Table' object_type, tc.comments object_comments FROM user_tables t LEFT OUTER JOIN user_mviews mv ON t.table_name = mv.mview_name LEFT OUTER JOIN user_tab_comments tc ON t.table_name = tc.table_name WHERE mv.mview_name IS NULL UNION ALL SELECT t.view_name object_name, 'View' object_type, tc.comments object_comments FROM user_views t LEFT OUTER JOIN user_tab_comments tc ON t.view_name = tc.table_name
